document.query: CREATE TABLE `promo_code_product` ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `promo_code_id` bigint(20), `product_id` bigint(20), `quantity` bigint(20), `disabled` tinyint(1), `created_at` datetime, `updated_at` datetime, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
